languages.text: "Я твой щит. Твой клинок. Твоя тень. И враги твои встретят возмездие в объятиях моих клинков".
"I am your shield. Your shadow. Your weapon. Your enemies will find only vengeance in the close embrace of my blades."
languages.original_text: "Я твой щит. Твой клинок. Твоя тень. И враги твои встретят возмездие в объятиях моих клинков".

traits.locale_text: "I am your shield. Your tool. Your shadow. And your enemies will meet vengeance in the embrace of my blades."
"I am your shield. Your tool. Your shadow. And your enemies will meet vengeance in the embrace of my blades."
"I am your shield. Your tool. Your shadow. Your enemies will find only vengeance in the close embrace of my blades."
"I am your shield. Your tool. Your shadow. Your enemies will find only vengeance in the close embrace of my blades."
"I am your shield. Your shadow. Your weapon. Your enemies will find only vengeance in the close embrace of my blades."
"I am your shield. Your shadow. Your weapon. Your enemies will find only vengeance in the close embrace of my blades."

languages.text: "Ich bin Euer Schild. Euer Schatten. Eure Waffe. Eure Feinde werden in der engen Umarmung durch meine Klingen nichts als Rache finden."
languages.original_text: "I am your shield. Your shadow. Your weapon. Your enemies will find only vengeance in the close embrace of my blades."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin Euer Schild. Euer Schatten. Eure Waffe. Eure Feinde werden in der engen Umarmung durch meine Klingen nichts als Rache finden."

languages.text: «Soy su escudo. Su sombra. Su arma. Sus enemigos solo encontrarán la venganza en el abrazo de mis dagas».
languages.original_text: "I am your shield. Your shadow. Your weapon. Your enemies will find only vengeance in the close embrace of my blades."

traits.locale_text: «Soy su escudo. Su sombra. Su arma. Sus enemigos solo encontrarán la venganza en el abrazo de mis dagas».

languages.text: 「私はあなたの盾であり、影であり、武器になる。あなたの敵は、私の刃にギュッと抱かれて、報復を目の当たりにするのよ」
languages.original_text: "I am your shield. Your shadow. Your weapon. Your enemies will find only vengeance in the close embrace of my blades."

traits.locale_text: 「私はあなたの盾であり、影であり、武器になる。あなたの敵は、私の刃にギュッと抱かれて、報復を目の当たりにするのよ」

languages.text: “我是你的坚盾，你的影子，你的利刃。你的敌人只会在刀锋的怀抱中品尝到冰冷的复仇。”
languages.original_text: "I am your shield. Your shadow. Your weapon. Your enemies will find only vengeance in the close embrace of my blades."

traits.locale_text: “我是你的坚盾，你的影子，你的利刃。你的敌人只会在刀锋的怀抱中品尝到冰冷的复仇。”

languages.text: « Je suis votre bouclier. Votre ombre. Votre arme. Vos ennemis ne trouveront que vengeance dans l'étreinte de mes lames. »
languages.original_text: "I am your shield. Your shadow. Your weapon. Your enemies will find only vengeance in the close embrace of my blades."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis votre bouclier. Votre ombre. Votre arme. Vos ennemis ne trouveront que vengeance dans l'étreinte de mes lames. »

languages.text: "Senin kalkanınım, senin gölgenim ve senin silahınım. Düşmanların, kılıcıma yaklaştıklarında salt intikam bulacak."
languages.original_text: "I am your shield. Your shadow. Your weapon. Your enemies will find only vengeance in the close embrace of my blades."
